product_name: Oakley Bottle Rocket Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: With their semi-rimless design and advanced polarized lenses, the Oakley Bottle Rocket Polarized Sunglasses will give you a wide open view of the adventures ahead of you. HD Polarized lenses eliminate haze and optical distortion; patented High Definition Optics(R) deliver exceptional visual clarity and protection. Polished Black frames come with an OO Red Iridium lens tint that offers enhanced contrast and balanced light transmission. Open-edge lenses have 8.75 base curvature to give you wide peripheral vision. Light and durable O Matter frame offers all-day comfort and a classic Oakley look with Unobtainium(R) earsocks that maintain a no-slip grip. Interchangeable lens design lets you use Oakley Authentic prescription lenses (not included).
short_description: With their semi-rimless design and advanced polarized lenses, the Oakley Bottle Rocket Polarized Sunglasses will give you a wide open view of the adventures ahead of you.
